settings.title: Military & First Responder Discount
settings.text: To thank you for your service, we'd like to offer a 25% discount off your purchase.

settings.title: WHO IS ELIGIBLE FOR THIS OFFER?
settings.text:
• Current and former U.S. Military
  • Law Enforcement, Fire, EMS and First Responders

settings.title: HOW IT WORKS:
settings.text:
• Click the button to claim your discount and you will be asked to verify your affiliation with GovX ID. The verification process is secure and is real-time.
  • After you are verified, you will receive a single-use discount code to apply at checkout. Be sure to copy your code. Note: Discount Code limitations apply.
